document.full_text: the head of exxon mobil  stopped short of blaming speculators for the run-up in oil prices, but he told congress on thursday that based only on the fundamentals of supply and demand, the price of oil should be in the range of $60 to $70 a barrel.
document.title: exxon says oil barrel should be in $60-$70 range
lines_and_colors: the head of exxon mobil  stopped short of blaming speculators for the run-up in oil prices, but he told congress on thursday that based only on the fundamentals of supply and demand, the price of oil should be in the range of $60 to $70 a barrel.
